parentMenu.description: pointer to menu that displayed me

focusedChild.description: The currently focused child widget, or null if there isn't one

tabIndex.description:
Tab index of the container; same as HTML tabindex attribute.
Note then when user tabs into the container, focus is immediately
moved to the first item in the container.

isContainer.description: Just a flag indicating that this widget descends from dijit._Container

title.value: A widget to transfer values through source and target Wires

description.value: This widget represents a controller task to transfer a value from a source to a target, through a source and a target Wires, when an event (a function) or a topic is issued. If this widget has child ChildWire widgets, their _addWire() methods are called to add Wire arguments to a source or a target Wire.
